name: Chameka Thompson
text: Freshman year my son was well adjusted finally after not wanting to go then here comes sophomore year (currently). Now he’s popular and well mannered clean and the harassment and embarrassment is approaching fast. He cannot go to class and back home without someone complaining about him! I don’t like it! Administration is assuming that anything going on has to do with my child and it is very discomforting for him to be a 15 year old and not enjoy his high school years with people that favors 1 class of kids over the other! Be careful everything that looks good is not! Dealing with Ms Kidd has been wonderful but others not so much!

name: ter b
text: My son just started and i am very excited, they have an amazing program for teens, college prep, work study and what makes it more amazing the wonderful staff that this school has they really care about these children. I am looking forward to the new school year.

name: Frank Franklin
text: Well organized school whose graduates receive multiple college scholarships.

name: Chanskillet
text: O.L.F.  is getting rid of middle school now that sucks bc now my friend has to go here and that rlly sucks

name: Dylan Watson
text: I ain't never been and ain't never gonna go

name: Pacific LeFleur
text: Very beautiful church!  Went to the 1130am Mass on Sunday.   Church was not crowded.   Nice vibe and the sermon was good.  Got my spiritual food for the week. 💕🌺💒

name: JR
text: I came to Mobile to discern a vocation to the religious life.  I came to St. Mary for daily Mass during those days.  Everyone, the priests and the people, were so supportive of me.  They really had kind words, especially when I was having a bad day because of work.  St. Mary's is a real Catholic community, one that Jesus would really be happy with.  The church is also very beautiful and I loved being there in prayer.  Thank you!
